name: Warm Buns
description:
Warm Buns is a game where you coordinate a cute cat bakery. Make the orders correctly and deliver to your clients in the right time. With each order, you receive a fish treat payment that can feed your baker cats and hire more of them!

This game was created and submitted for Mini Jam #124, a 72-hour game jam whose general theme was “warmth” and the limitation theme was “your score serves a purpose”.

How to play:

You use your mouse for every action in this game.

Click and drag the ingredients necessary to make a dough to the baking table, following the recipes on the left. Drag the dough to the oven to bake it, then deliver it by dragging it to top of the order. Make sure not to let it burn!

Click and drag the fish treats to the cats to feed them. Do not let their hunger reach zero, or else they stop working!
